module.name: product_view_definition_relationship
module.name.french: Relation entre définition et vue de produit
module.purpose: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of context-dependent relationships between definitions of product versions.

inscope.li: context-dependent relationship between two product definitions;
representation of the fact that a product version is used in another one.

uof.name: Product_View_Definition_Relationship
uof.description: The Product_View_Definition_Relationship UoF specifies the structures to represent context-dependent relatioinships between definitions of product versions.
